title: Kim Un-chol
text: Kim Un-chol (born September 23, 1979) is a <a href="North%20Korea">North Korea</a>n <a href="boxing">boxer</a> who competed in the <a href="light%20flyweight">light flyweight</a> (– 48 kg) division at the <a href="2000%20Summer%20Olympics">2000 Summer Olympics</a> and won the bronze medal.
